documentation.title: Declare Statements Block Mode
documentation.standard: Defines the block mode usage of declare directives.

code.title: Valid: Declare statement written in non-block mode.
Invalid: Declare statement written with curly braces or alternative syntax.

documentation.standard: A declare statement for the `strict_types` directive is not allowed to be written using curly braces or with alternative syntax.

code.title: Valid: strict_types statement not using block mode.
Invalid: strict_types statement using alternative syntax/curly braces.
